allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Windows development: Electron app improvements and new features

- Updated Electron main process with Windows-specific configurations
- Added printer hardware support for Windows
- Added database analytics module
- Added Admin Dashboard page
- Updated vite config for better Windows compatibility
- Added electron.vite.config.ts for Electron build
- Updated dependencies in package.json

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(powershell -Command "Remove-Item Env:ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; cd 'e:/Github/creative-mut-app'; npm run dev":*)
Bash(cmd.exe /c "cd /d e:\Github\creative-mut-app\scripts\python && call venv\Scripts\activate.bat && pyinstaller --distpath ..\..\resources\python --workpath build build_pipeline.spec --noconfirm")
Bash(cmd.exe /c "cd /d e:\Github\creative-mut-app\scripts\python && venv\Scripts\python.exe -m PyInstaller --distpath ..\..\resources\python --workpath build build_pipeline.spec --noconfirm")
Bash(git -C "e:/Github/creative-mut-app" add .gitignore MUT-distribution/pipeline.py electron/python/bridge.ts package.json python/stitch_images.py scripts/python/build_pipeline.spec)

Bash(git -C "e:/Github/creative-mut-app" add electron/config/app-config.ts electron/main.ts electron/preload.ts src/screens/03-FrameSelectionScreen.tsx src/screens/04-ShootingGuideScreen.tsx src/store/sessionStore.ts)

Bash(git -C "e:/Github/creative-mut-app" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Unicode encoding error for Korean Windows deployment

- Remove all emoji characters from pipeline.py print statements
- Replace emojis with ASCII alternatives ([OK], [ERROR], [WARN], etc.)
- Fixes cp949 codec UnicodeEncodeError on Korean Windows systems
- Update PyInstaller spec and build configuration

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "e:/Github/creative-mut-app" add .claude/settings.local.json .env MUT-distribution/pipeline.py dist-electron/main.js dist-electron/preload.js electron/main.ts electron/preload.ts src/App.tsx src/screens/03-FrameSelectionScreen.tsx src/screens/08-ImageSelectionScreen.tsx src/screens/09-PaymentScreen.tsx src/screens/10-PrintingScreen.tsx src/screens/ShadowEffectScreen.tsx src/store/appStore.ts src/store/types.ts scripts/test-tl3600-final.cjs scripts/test-tl3600-multi-baud.cjs scripts/test-tl3600-tid.cjs scripts/test-tl3600.cjs scripts/test-tl3600.ts)
